text_logic_form: The perimeter of the regular pentagon $KLMNQ$ is $40$ units.
Find the area of the regular pentagon $KLMNQ$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The perimeter of the regular pentagon $KLMNQ$ is $40$ units.
Find the area of the regular pentagon $KLMNQ$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $N$.
The line connecting $P$ and $Q$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $N$ and $M$.
line_instances: There are lines $KJ$, $KQ$, $LK$, $LM$, $MN$, $MP$, $MQ$, $NJ$, $NP$, $QN$, $QP$, forming the regular pentagon $KLMNQ$.
